Object.name: SecGrantAllAccessToAdminRole

Part.Source:
For Each Where SecRoleName = &SecRoleName &SecRoleId = SecRoleId Do 'GrantAccess' Exit When None msg(format(!"Creating role '%1'...", &SecRoleName), status) New SecRoleName = &SecRoleName SecRoleDescription = &SecRoleName EndNew For Each Where SecRoleName = &SecRoleName &SecRoleId = SecRoleId Do 'GrantAccess' Exit EndFor EndFor
If &AssignRoleToUser For Each Where SecUserName = &SecUserName &SecUserId = SecUserId Do 'AssignRole' Exit When None msg(format(!"Creating user '%1'...", &SecUserName), status) New SecUserName = &SecUserName SecUserPassword = &SecUserName EndNew For Each Where SecUserName = &SecUserName &SecUserId = SecUserId Do 'AssignRole' Exit EndFor EndFor EndIf
Sub 'GrantAccess'
For Each Defined By SecFunctionalityDescription For Each Where SecRoleId = &SecRoleId
When None msg(format(!"Adding functionality '%1' to role '%2'...", SecFunctionalityKey, &SecRoleName), status) New SecRoleId = &SecRoleId SecFunctionalityId = SecFunctionalityId EndNew EndFor EndFor Commit
EndSub
Sub 'AssignRole' For Each Where SecRoleId = &SecRoleId Where SecUserId = &SecUserId Exit When None msg(format(!"Adding role '%1' to user '%2'...", &SecRoleName, &SecUserName), status) New SecRoleId = &SecRoleId SecUserId = &SecUserId EndNew EndFor Commit EndSub
parm(in:&SecRoleName, in:&AssignRoleToUser, in:&SecUserName);

&IsAuthorized = False &SecRolIds = SecGetRolesFromLoggedUser.Udp()
For &SecRolId in &SecRolIds For Each Where SecRoleId = &SecRolId Where SecFunctionalityId = &SecFunctionalityId
&IsAuthorized = True Exit EndFor If &IsAuthorized Exit EndIf EndFor
parm(in:&SecFunctionalityId, out:&IsAuthorized);
&IsAuthorized = False For Each Where SecFunctionalityKey = &SecFunctionalityKey &IsAuthorized = SecIsAuthByFunctionalityId.Udp(SecFunctionalityId) Exit When none &IsAuthorized = False EndFor
parm(in:&SecFunctionalityKey, out:&IsAuthorized);
&IsAuthorized = False For &SecFunctionalityKey in &SecFunctionalityKeys &IsAuthorized = SecIsAuthByFunctionalityKey.Udp(&SecFunctionalityKey) If &IsAuthorized Exit EndIf EndFor
parm(in:&SecFunctionalityKeys, out:&IsAuthorized);

&IsAuthorized = False &LowerSecObjectName = trim(lower(&SecObjectName)) For Each Where SecObjectName = &LowerSecObjectName &IsAuthorized = SecIsAuthByFunctionalityId.Udp(SecFunctionalityId) If &IsAuthorized Exit EndIf When None &IsAuthorized = True EndFor
parm(in:&SecObjectName, out:&IsAuthorized);
